summary: Muay Thai, or Thai boxing, is a popular martial art and sport from Thailand. It's known for using eight points of contact: fists, elbows, knees, and shins. Fighters, called Nak Muay, use punches, kicks, and clinching techniques. This sport gained worldwide popularity when Thai fighters started competing internationally in the late 20th century. It's governed by the Professional Boxing Association of Thailand and is related to other Southeast Asian martial arts.
title: Muay Thai
